item.title: Varnish Cache Invalidation
item.author: roman.heinrich@gmail.com
item.description: Solutions from Varnish: Default approach Hashtwo/Hashninja Hashtwo maintains an additional hash, in addition to the main hash that links objects and content in Varnish. You can put whatever you want into the hash and it will maintain a many-to-many relationship between keys and objects So, in the example above the content presentation layer could spit out the same list of articles in a header and hashtwo will maintain pointers from article numbers to cached object.
